---
labels: ['harmony', 'platforms', 'api', 'gateway', 'server', 'backends']
description: 'A general purpose API gateway for Harmony platforms.'
---

A general purpose GraphQL and REST API gateway for the composition of micro services in a [Platforms](https://bit.dev/docs/composable-platforms/#service-oriented-platforms) setup.

For example, [the following Platform](https://bit.cloud/backend/kubernetes/examples/platform) uses this Gateway server to compose the Discussion server and the User server. The compositions happens both locally (in development) and when applied to a K8S cluster.

```ts
/** @filename: my-platform.bit-app.ts */

// ...

import { Platform } from '@bitdev/platforms.platform';

const UserServer = import.meta.resolve(
  '@backend/kubernetes.examples.user-server'
);
const DiscussionServer = import.meta.resolve(
  '@backend/kubernetes.examples.discussion-server'
);
const PlatformGateway = import.meta.resolve(
  '@backend/kubernetes.examples.gateway-server'
);

export const AcmePlatform = Platform.from({
  // ...
  backends: {
    main: PlatformGateway,
    services: [
      [
        UserServer,
        { name: 'user-server', remoteUrl: 'http://user-server-service' },
      ],
      [
        DiscussionServer,
        {
          name: 'discussion-server',
          remoteUrl: 'http://discussion-server-service',
        },
      ],
    ],
  },
 // ...
  }),
});

export default AcmePlatform;
```
